description: Hon. Anil Gooneratne J - Nations Trust Bank PLC No. 24...
parties: Nations Trust Bank PLC No. 242, Union Place, Colombo 2. PLAINTIFF Vs. Pulukkuttige Don Dinesh Shammika Kumara Piyathilake No. 493, Old Kottawa Road, Udahamulla, Nugegoda.
